trans-unit.source: Represents the execution environment of an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa o ambiente de execução de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Represents the execution environment of an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: Representa o ambiente de execução de um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.

trans-unit.source: This class selectively exposes workflow runtime capabilities and services to individual activities.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe expõe seletivamente recursos de tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho e serviços para as atividades individuais.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Understanding the Activity Execution Context](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60a032ef-4c51-482f-9aa8-fce406856b29).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Noções básicas sobre o contexto de execução da atividade](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60a032ef-4c51-482f-9aa8-fce406856b29).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> that currently executes within this execution context.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que atualmente é executado dentro desse contexto de execução.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> associated to this execution context.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> associado a este contexto de execução.

trans-unit.source: This instance is marked for garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Esta instância é marcada para coleta de lixo.

trans-unit.source: The canceled <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> cancelada.

trans-unit.source: Called by a composite activity to schedule the cancellation of a child activity.
trans-unit.target: Chamada por uma atividade de composição para agendar o cancelamento de uma atividade filho.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime disallows cancellation of a child activity that is not in the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Executing" /> state.
trans-unit.target: O tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho não permite o cancelamento de uma atividade filho que não esteja no estado <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Executing" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="activity" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="activity" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="activity" /> is not a valid child of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="activity" /> não é um filho válido do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" />.

trans-unit.source: This means that either the argument is equal to the associated <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity" /> or that the argument is not in the commented state and is a child of the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity" /> associated with this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Isso significa que o argumento é igual ao <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity" /> associado ou que o argumento não está no estado comentado e é um filho do <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity" /> associado a esse <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="activity" /> is not in the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Executing" /> state.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="activity" /> não está no estado <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Executing" />.

trans-unit.source: Indicates to the workflow runtime that the currently executing activity should transition to the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Indica para o tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho que a atividade em execução no momento deve mudar para o estado <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed" />.

trans-unit.source: The status of the associated <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity" /> is not equal to <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Executing" /> or <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Canceling" /> or <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Compensating" /> or <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed" />.
trans-unit.target: O status do <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity" /> associado não é igual a <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Executing" />, <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Canceling" />, <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Compensating" /> ou <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed" />.

trans-unit.source: The disposed <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> descartado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see langword="ContextID" /> of the associated <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see langword="ContextID" /> do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> associado.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="ContextID" /> of the associated <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see langword="ContextID" /> dos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.

trans-unit.source: Represents an exception that has occurred during the execution of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma exceção que ocorreu durante a execução da instância do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: This property has a value only when an activity is in the faulting state.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade tem um valor somente quando uma atividade está no estado de falha.

trans-unit.source: The executed <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> executado.

trans-unit.source: Called by a composite activity to schedule the execution of a child activity.
trans-unit.target: Chamado por uma atividade de composição para agendar a execução de uma atividade filho.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime disallows execution of a child activity that is not in the initialized state.
trans-unit.target: O tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho não permite a execução de uma atividade filho que não esteja no estado inicializado.

trans-unit.source: If the status is <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed>, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> is initialized and executed.
trans-unit.target: Se o status for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed>, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> é inicializado e executado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="activity" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="activity" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="activity" /> is not a valid child of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="activity" /> não é um filho válido do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" />.

trans-unit.source: This means that either the argument is equal to the associated <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity" /> or that the argument is not in the commented state and is a child of the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity" /> associated with this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Isso significa que o argumento é igual ao <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity" /> associado ou que o argumento não está no estado comentado e é um filho do <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity" /> associado a esse <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" />.

trans-unit.source: The status is neither initialized nor <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed" />.
trans-unit.target: O status não é inicializado nem <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContextManager" /> associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContextManager" /> associado a esta instância.

trans-unit.source: the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContextManager" /> associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContextManager" /> associado a esta instância.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the service.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> do serviço.

trans-unit.source: Returns a service of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um serviço do tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: A service <see cref="T:System.Object" /> of the specified <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: Um serviço <see cref="T:System.Object" /> do <see cref="T:System.Type" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The specified type for which the provider is to be returned.
trans-unit.target: O tipo especificado para o qual o provedor é a ser retornado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a service provider of the specified <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um provedor de serviço do <see cref="T:System.Type" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A service provider <see cref="T:System.Object" /> of the specified <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: Um provedor de serviço <see cref="T:System.Object" /> do <see cref="T:System.Type" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" />.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the track method for the associated <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o método de controle para o <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity" /> associado.

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the data to track.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que especifica os dados a serem rastreados.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the track method for the associated <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o método de controle para o <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity" /> associado.

trans-unit.source: The tracking routine is defined as part of the interface provided by each activity.
trans-unit.target: A rotina de rastreamento é definida como parte da interface fornecida por cada atividade.

trans-unit.source: See comment in user-supplied custom code.
trans-unit.target: Consulte os comentários no código personalizado fornecido pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="userData" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="userData" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> associated with this instance is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: Se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> associado a esta instância é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" />).

trans-unit.source: The member of <c>userData</c> to track.
trans-unit.target: O membro de <c>userData</c> a ser rastreado.

trans-unit.source: The data to track.
trans-unit.target: Os dados a serem rastreados.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the track method for the associated <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o método de controle para o <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity" /> associado.

trans-unit.source: The tracking routine is defined as part of the interface provided by each activity.
trans-unit.target: A rotina de rastreamento é definida como parte da interface fornecida por cada atividade.

trans-unit.source: It is user supplied custom code.
trans-unit.target: É o código personalizado fornecido pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="userData" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="userData" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> associated with this instance is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: Se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> associado a esta instância é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" />).
